attributes.action: Ensure that Head Teachers stand by their positions regarding Loco Parentis
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whilst the Goverment has ensured that children are safe at school by introducing anti-bullying guidelines, some head teachers are failing children in this. A High Court Judge ruled that the Head effectivly stands in for a parent in their absence so therefore should take on board more the Policies layed down regarding bullying. They should take more responibility regarding children who are being bullied instead of leaving it the parents who are left to pick up the peices.
